title: Correction to: Webs of intrigue: museum genomics elucidate relationships of the marronoid spider clade (Araneae)
content: This is a correction to: Jacob A Gorneau, Sarah C Crews, Franklyn Cala-Riquelme, Katherine O Montana, Joseph C Spagna, Francesco Ballarin, Lina M Almeida-Silva, Lauren A Esposito, Webs of intrigue: museum genomics elucidate relationships of the marronoid spider clade (Araneae), Insect Systematics and Diversity, Volume 7, Issue 5, September 2023, 5, https://doi.org/10.1093/isd/ixad021
siteTitle: Insect Systematics and Diversity Current Issue
